body_html:
I've made a few changes:

  • Renamed the ops to cumsum and cumprod
  • Added GPU support
  • Added a reverse kwarg to efficiently compute backwards scans
  • Added gradients (the cumprod gradient still uses the / x hack)
  • Added tests

My Eigen PR has also been merged, so we will be able to test the PR as soon as Eigen is updated to the newest version.

Added GPU support

body:
I've made a few changes:
- Renamed the ops to `cumsum` and `cumprod`
- Added GPU support
- Added a `reverse` kwarg to efficiently compute backwards scans
- Added gradients (the `cumprod` gradient still uses the `/ x` hack)
- Added tests

My Eigen PR has also been merged, so we will be able to test the PR as soon as Eigen is updated to the newest version.
